title: The Wall Is Completed Despite Schemes
summary: Nehemiah’s enemies try to distract and intimidate him through deception and false prophets, but he remains focused. The wall is completed in just 52 days, and surrounding nations are humbled by God’s work.

faq.question: How did Nehemiah respond to enemy plots?
faq.answer: He refused to be distracted or frightened, saying, 'I am doing a great work and cannot come down.'

faq.question: How long did it take to finish the wall?
faq.answer: Only 52 days—showing God's help and the people’s determination.
